description: Increase any character's attributes 5 times (through battles or Expeditions).
Complete Episode 1-1-3 of the Main Story, "The Exam Begins!" on Normal difficulty (Quests > Main).
Complete Episode 1-1-7 of the Main Story, "Demonic Beast Horde" on Normal difficulty (Quests > Main).

summary:
Complete the Training Cave Once
(Unlock via Main 1-1-7)
description: Complete the Monster-filled Training Cave once (Quests > Daily > Monster-filled Training Cave).
Level a Style up to Lv 3 at the Dojo (Dojo > Enhance Styles).
Complete Episode 1-1-9 of the Main Story, "Upper Floors" on Normal difficulty (Quests > Main).
Level a Style up to Lv 10 at the Dojo (Dojo > Enhance Styles).
Return instantly from 2 Expeditions at the Dojo (Home > Dojo).
Defeat the Water Dragon in Episode 1-2-12 of the Main Story, "Summit's Gate" on Normal difficulty (Quests > Main).
Return instantly from 3 Expeditions at the Dojo (Home > Dojo).
Enhance a piece of equipment to Level 2 at the Forge (obtain materials from quests: Quests > Main).
Defeat the Carmine in Episode 2-1-10 of the Main Story, "Cavern Exit" on Normal difficulty (Quests > Main).

summary:
Complete Treasure Hunt Once
(Unlock via Main 2-1-10)
description: Complete the Big Treasure Hunt once (Quests > Daily > Big Treasure Hunt).
Level a Style up to Lv 15 at the Dojo (Dojo > Enhance Styles).
Defeat the Spriggan in Episode 2-2-10 of the Main Story, "Underground Inhabitant" on Normal difficulty (Quests > Main).

summary:
Complete Spiral Corridor Floor 3
(Unlock via Main 2-2-10)
description: Complete Spiral Corridor Floor 3 (Quests > Challenge > Spiral Corridor)
Return instantly from 5 Expeditions at the Dojo (Home > Dojo > Expeditions).
Defeat the Ogre Warrior in Episode 3-1-12 of the Main Story, "Scaccini's Assassins" on Normal difficulty (Quests > Main).
Unlock Style Level Cap 5 times (Dojo > Unlock Style Level Cap).
Replenish training energy once (Dojo > Training > Add NRG).
Defeat Yami in Episode 3-2-6 of the Main Story, "Castle Keeper" on Normal difficulty (Quests > Main).
Complete Ruins Exploration: Tri Glowstones 5 times (Quests > Daily > Ruins Exploration).
Evolve equipment once at the Forge (obtain materials from quests: Quests > Daily > Ruins Exploration).
Defeat Daean Soldier in Episode 4-1-10 of the Main Story, "Lurking Shadow" on Normal difficulty. (Quests > Main)
Complete Episode 1-1-1 of the Main Story, "The Exam Begins!" on Hard difficulty (Quests > Main).
Return instantly from 10 Expeditions at the Dojo (Home > Dojo > Expeditions).
Defeat Tu Kwai in Episode 4-2-10 of the Main Story, "Crimson Commander" on Normal difficulty (Quests > Main).
